definition.text: This indicator calculates a scaled aggregated of the PPO (Price Percentage Oscillator), center of gravity, a scaled RSI and the mean slope of the price action.

paragraphs.text: This indicator contains many components, and as such can be used in a manner of different ways, that is up to the trader.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| PPO_Aggregate | ppo_agg | ppoWeighted, ppoReweighted, div, signal, thresholdValue, AggregateLR |
The length of the individual indicators can be adjusted by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "PPO Aggregate" Procedure Loop.
